page.title: 13Clubs in Ashford Carbonell
page.content: There are about four clubs in our survey area.There are 'Women's Cricket', 'Women's Rounders',Brownies and W.I. (W.I.stands for Womens Institute). The Brownies and the W.I. meet in the village hall.There is the local sports club that looks after the sports field,providing facilities for football,rounders,tennis and cricket.A bowling green is being prepared this year also,as is a children's playing area.The village sports teams regulary play 'friendlies' against other local village teams,and the sports field is also used by other village teams who do not have a playing field.
